author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video from the ‘Motion Design in Unreal Engine’ series, in which Nick Jushchyshyn (AKA Pixel Prof) explores the creation of responsive templates to create dynamic motion graphics using UE 5.6.

You’ll get a look at how to:

Create basic lower thirds-style graphics 
Design more complicated versions for dynamic scenarios like political election coverage and live sports
Use Unreal Motion Design’s Transition Logic and Rundown features which provide the foundation for creating and running this type of graphic

Don’t miss the next instalment of this Motion Design tutorial series! To learn more about Motion Design in Unreal Engine, check out the Epic Developer Community: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/motion-design-in-unreal-engine

#MotionDesign, #ResponsiveTemplates, #DynamicGraphics, #TransitionLogic, #Rundown, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #PixelProf
title: Motion Design in Unreal Engine, Episode 09: Responsive Templates

author: Unreal Engine
description:
This session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm explores procedural content generation (PCG) techniques for large-scale entertainment venue designs, including stadiums, arenas, and theatres.

Watch the video to see how modular approaches to architectural design coupled with PCG can enable rapid, performant pathways for digital conceptualization and design phases.  

The session also touches on approaches to enriching entertainment venues with interactive elements via PCG, how RealityScan can be used as part of the modular approach, and how we can share these modular pieces on the Fab marketplace to empower the wider community of users in their own design journeys.

Learn more about procedural content generation in Unreal Engine here: dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/procedural-content-generation-overview

#ArchitecturalDesign, #ProceduralContentGeneration, #RealityScan, #Fab, #PCG, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: Procedural Content Generation for Entertainment Venue Design | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025
